scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Dorothy Van Vleek Oliver attended Radford College from 1944-48. Her scrapbook documents the social and acdemic life at Radford College during the end of the Second World War and during the first few years of Radford's era as the Woman's Division of VIrginia Polytechnic Institute.

blockquote.p: Contains one scrapbook of loose pages without a cover.
